description.p: PhazeAI IDE is an open-source, AI-native development environment built for developers who want powerful AI assistance without giving up privacy or control.

ul.li: Multi-model AI support: Claude, OpenAI, Ollama (local), Groq, and more
Integrated terminal with full ANSI/VT100 support
LSP integration for code intelligence (hover, goto-def, completions)
Git integration with diff viewer and inline blame
Symbol outline, bracket matching, and code folding
AI-powered inline code editing with per-hunk review
